attributes.action: place a tax on plastic carrier shopping bags.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2002 the Republic of Ireland placed a 15 cents tax per bag in an attempt to curb litter. In the three months after the tax was introduced in Ireland, shops handed out just over 23 million plastic bags - about 277 million fewer than normal.

Think of the lack of litter. Think about the benefit to the environment. It's a real no-brainer!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
